name: Fofo's bloom (Baba is You levelpack)
description:
So hutthutthutt told me that there is a Baba is You levelpack competition hosted in the "Baba is You" discord server. I joined the server and made this levelpack that adds a new rule (Don't worry, I used hidden rules in the levels for that).

The theme was "Spring is in the air". The bloom rule is like if the nature comes back to life after winter, and become like Fofo that looks like a walking plant.

Music credits :
Cat by C418
Wait by C418
